title: Allow flexible routing with SERVER_NAME config
raw_output: Issue 2813 is about allowing flexible routing when SERVER_NAME config is set. The fix involves modifying how the app handles SERVER_NAME in URL routing. Predicted files: (1) src/flask/app.py - main app file with routing logic. (2) src/flask/sansio/app.py - the sans-IO base app implementation. (3) CHANGES.rst - changelog entry. (4) tests/test_basic.py - basic app tests covering routing behavior. Exploration: Both app.py files handle routing configuration. src/flask/app.py -> tests/test_basic.py.
